entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 32. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:34 PM MST Saturday 31 December 2022
